title: Key Features of the Continuous Monitoring System for Inventory Management:
text-1: All records from storage to retrieval are fully automated.
text-2: The Edge AI camera 'Vieureka' constantly monitors and records the movements of items tagged with colorbit® in place of humans.
text-3: colorbit® is a marker that is easily recognized by IoT cameras. It can be used in scenarios where barcodes, QR codes, and electronic tags may not be suitable.
